title: Who has taken the first wicket in the IPL 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Piyush Chawla took the first wicket of IPL 2020 Season against Mumbai Indians and he picked up the wicket of Rohit Sharma.  Google Image I want to tell you that Cheenai Super Kings and Mumbai Indians played the opening match of IPL 13 Season and in that Cheenai Super Kings won the match by 5 wickets and started the tournament with a win.

The leggie who no one thought could play at such old age. The veteran who has defied all the criticisms and proved his worth and the confidence shown him by his captain. He has done the same in the past, but this time it was different. . . . . . . . . . . . . It's not Imran Tahir
